thread.title: Rossitza Mladenova
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Rossitza Mladenova

author: Rossitza Mladenova
title: Rossitza Mladenova
text:
Chosing a bouquet from the website and placing the order with all the details was easy.
Product and price Information was correct.
Product was delivered on time without any friction or fuss.
So I am perfectly satisfied with the service and would recommend it further.
Note: I made a "same day delivery" order and asked for a specific time frame for the delivery, even though it said on the website that they cannot guarantee a specific delivery time. Still they made an effort and delivered the flowers almost within the time frame, which was perfect. I also got 2 sms-s from the company notifying me when the order got on its way to the recepient and when the order had been delivered. I got the two messages one right after the other, so the 1st message was delayed, but that could be due to international mobile operator issues, as it happens sometimes.
